data: `minecraft:block_collision` describes the collision of the block with entities and actors. If set to false, it disables the collision of the block with entities. An origin of [-8.0, 0.0, -8.0] with a size of [16, 16, 16] is a unit cube.
`minecraft:block_collision` requires the Holiday Creator Features experimental toggle to be set to `true` in order to function properly.

>Holiday Creator Features contains experimental gameplay features. As with all experiments, you may see additions, removals, and changes in functionality in Minecraft versions without significant advanced warning.
>To learn more about Experimental Features, please visit [Experimental Features in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition](../../../../../Documents/ExperimentalFeaturesToggle.md)
